template.name: AVI
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &AS,broadcast chan &AP,broadcast chan &VS

template.name: LRI
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &AP,broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &AS

template.name: AVI_MS
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &AS,broadcast chan &AP,broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &DDD, broadcast chan &VDI

template.name: LRI_MS
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &AP,broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &DDD, broadcast chan &VDI

template.name: PVARP
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &Aget, broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &AR, broadcast chan &A_act, broadcast chan &ABlock

template.name: PVARP_n
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &Aget, broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &AR, broadcast chan &A_act, broadcast chan &ABlock

template.name: VRP
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &Vget, broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &V_act,broadcast chan &VBlock

template.name: VRP_n
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &Vget, broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &V_act,broadcast chan &VBlock

template.name: RanV
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Vget,broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &V_act

template.name: RanA
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Aget,broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &A_act

template.name: RanA_n
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Aget,broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &A_act

template.name: URI
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VS,broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &V_act

template.name: URI_test
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Vget, broadcast chan &VP

template.name: interval
template.parameter: broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &AR, broadcast chan &Fast, broadcast chan &Slow

template.name: Counter2
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Fast, broadcast chan &Slow, broadcast chan &DDD, broadcast chan &VDI, broadcast chan &du_beg, broadcast chan &du_end

template.name: test_MS
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VDI

template.name: dur_count
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &du_beg, broadcast chan &du_end

template.name: cond
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Aget, broadcast chan &Vget, broadcast chan &A_act, broadcast chan &V_act, broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &VP, int Tantemin, int Tantemax, int Tretromin, int Tretromax

template.name: ELT_det1
template.parameter: broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &VP, broadcast chan &AR, broadcast chan &ABLOCK, broadcast chan &VB

template.name: VPAS
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &AS, broadcast chan &AP, broadcast chan &AR, broadcast chan &reset, broadcast chan &VP_AS

template.name: vp_vp
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VP,broadcast chan &VS

template.name: ELT_count
template.parameter: broadcast chan &reset, broadcast chan &VP_AS

template.name: v_v
template.parameter: broadcast chan &VS, broadcast chan &VP

template.name: v_v1
template.parameter: broadcast chan &Vget, broadcast chan &VP

nta.system: broadcast chan AP,AS,VP,VS,Vget,Aget,AR,A_act,V_act,ABlock,VBlock,reset,VP_AS,Fast,Slow,du_beg,du_end,DDD,VDI; PAVI = AVI(VP,AS,AP,VS); PLRI=LRI(VP,AP,VS,AS); PPVARP_n=PVARP_n(VP,AS,Aget,VS,AR,A_act,ABlock); PPVARP=PVARP(VP,AS,Aget,VS,AR,A_act,ABlock); PVRP_n=VRP_n(VP,Vget,VS,V_act,VBlock); PVRP=VRP(VP,Vget,VS,V_act,VBlock); PURI=URI(VS,VP,V_act); PAVI_MS = AVI_MS(VP,AS,AP,VS,DDD,VDI); PLRI_MS=LRI_MS(VP,AP,VS,AS,DDD,VDI); Pinterval=interval(AP,AS,AR,Fast,Slow); PCounter2=Counter2(Fast,Slow,DDD,VDI,du_beg,du_end); Pdur_count=dur_count(VS,VP,du_beg,du_end); PVPAS=VPAS(VP,VS,AS,AP,AR,reset,VP_AS); PELT_count=ELT_count(reset,VP_AS); PRanV=RanV(Vget,VP,V_act); PRanA=RanA(Aget,AP,A_act); Pcond=cond(Aget,Vget,A_act,V_act,AP,VP,150,200,150,200); PURI_test=URI_test(Vget,VP); Pvv=v_v1(Vget,VP); Pvp_vp=vp_vp(VP,VS); PMS=test_MS(VDI); PELT_det=ELT_det1(AS,AP,VS,VP,AR,ABlock,VBlock); system PAVI_MS,PLRI_MS,PPVARP,PVRP,PURI,Pinterval,PCounter2,Pdur_count,PVPAS,PELT_count,PRanV,PRanA;////system PAVI_MS,PLRI_MS,PPVARP,PVRP,PURI,Pinterval,PCounter2,Pdur_count,PRanV,PRanA;//system PAVI,PLRI,PPVARP,PVRP,PURI,PVPAS,PELT_count,PRanV,PRanA; //system PAVI,PLRI,PPVARP_n,PVRP_n,PURI,PRanV,PRanA; // //
